ThingDef.label: mutagenic honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by mutagenic bees. They are in constant flux, with random animal parts mutating and merging through their whole body. As long as a vial of mutagenic Mechanite Slurry is nearby, these bees will collect it and store it in their honeycombs, slowly producing more of it. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get Psychotropic honey, brittlewax and Mechanite Slurry.

ThingDef.label: mutanite honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by mutanite bees, which are infused with the sickening green glow of dangerous activated mechanites. If a chunk of mutanite is placed nearby, the bees will gradually though very slowly replicate more of it on their honeycombs. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get Psychotropic honey, heavywax and mutanite chunks.

ThingDef.label: morph honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by morph bees, which are expert weavers, intricately lacing cloth with mutagenic nanites. As long as a piece of Morphsilk is nearby, they will replicate the pattern and slowly weave it into their combs. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get Psychotropic honey, brittlewax and Morphsilk.
